attributes.action: Use all additional tax raised at the next budget to at least match local government funding for public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To enable people to have an alternative to using their private car the government needs to invest extra money in public transport. To raise this money we propose all the extra money that they raised at the next budget(s) should be ring fenced to be used on public transport, mostly to match funding provided by local councils. This way for every£1of our council tax that is used on public transport£2will be invested in public transport without anyone paying more than they would have had to have done anyway. 
This could mean that: rural services are retained, newer buses, more bus shelters, more trains, branch lines reopened, or any other public transport improvement that can not currently be undertaken due to lack of funds.
Even if you love driving you should sign up so that people that don’t need to drive get off the roads leading to less congestion for you to get stuck in and you don’t have to pay for the privilege!
If you agree please sign up and get others to do so too.
